summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6133 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 68, 69, 70 and 71, Kilbourne's Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley between Kensington Place and Kirkwood Place from North 56th Street to North 57th Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85281, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
